html:
Bread = Corn. Bread is put by Figure of speech Metonymy (of Effect), for the corn of which it is made. CompareJob 28:5 .

bruised = crushed: i.e. reduced to powder. CompareExodus 32:20. 2 Kings 23:6 . Render, as a question: Is corn crushed? because = nay. The Hebrew accent t ebir is disjunctive and requires this rendering. Compare Revised Version margin, andJob 22:2 .

ever = for ever.
